backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user authentication, preferences management, crypto news/price fetching via HTTP outcalls, alert history persistence, and transformation functions for external API responses.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features for staggered API request batching, client-side caching, partial data rendering, and enhanced retry logic with associated test IDs and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React files including components, pages, hooks, services, and utilities for the crypto trading dashboard application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using oklch color space for the application's design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Rajdhani and JetBrains Mono fonts from Google Fonts and mounting the React application at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for Dashboard, CryptoDetail, and Alerts pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider (dark mode) and Layout with Toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/AddPositionDialo: Empty file placeholder for add position dialog component.
frontend/src/components/AddTradeDialog.t: Empty file placeholder for add trade dialog component.
frontend/src/components/AITradeAnalysisC: Card component displaying AI-generated trade recommendations with confidence scores, risk levels, entry/exit prices, stop-loss/take-profit targets, and reasoning based on technical indicators, signals, patterns, and support/resistance levels.
frontend/src/components/AlertCard.tsx: Displays a single trading alert as a card with crypto info, signal type (buy/sell/hold), trigger reason, timestamp, and visual styling including glows and borders based on signal type.
frontend/src/components/AlertFilters.tsx: Provides dropdown filters for alerts by cryptocurrency and signal type (buy/sell/hold), with a reset button to clear all active filters.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Renders a login/logout button that integrates with Internet Identity authentication and initializes user preferences on first login.
frontend/src/components/CandlestickChart: Displays a line chart with price data, technical indicators, support/resistance levels, candlestick patterns, and trade recommendations with entry/exit markers; includes error handling and retry functionality.
frontend/src/components/CryptoTable.tsx: Renders a table of cryptocurrencies with market data (price, 24h change, volume, market cap) and real-time trading signals calculated from technical indicators; includes per-row error handling and retry.
Displays technical indicators (RSI, MACD, moving averages, Bollinger Bands) in a grid of cards with color-coded values and visual effects for extreme conditions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with header, navigation, API health monitoring banner, theme toggle, and authentication button. Includes mobile menu sheet and sticky header with neon-styled branding.
frontend/src/components/MarketSentimentP: Displays market sentiment analysis with fear/greed index, overall sentiment badge (bullish/bearish/neutral), and lists of top gainers and losers in a three-card grid layout.
frontend/src/components/PatternLegend.ts: Shows detected candlestick patterns as colored badges (bullish/bearish/neutral) in a card with wrapped layout.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioSummary: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/PositionCard.tsx: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/SignalBadge.tsx: Displays a trading signal (buy/sell/hold) as a badge with icon and tooltip showing reason, confidence, and indicator details.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Theme toggle button that switches between light/dark modes and persists user preference to backend via Internet Identity actor.
frontend/src/components/TimeframeSelecto: Tab selector for switching between 1H, 4H, and Daily chart timeframes.
frontend/src/components/TradeCard.tsx: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/TradingSignalsPa: Two-card panel displaying active trading signals with badges and support/resistance levels with prices.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistPanel.t: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlertHistory.ts: Provides queries and mutations for managing alert history including filtering, 24-hour alerts, stats, saving new alerts, and clearing alerts via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlertNotifications: Monitors top 10 cryptocurrencies every 60 seconds for trading signals, displays toast notifications for new signals, and saves alerts to backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useApiHealthMonitor.t: Monitors API health by analyzing React Query cache for crypto-related queries, calculating success rates, and returning health status (healthy/degraded/issues) with color and message.
frontend/src/hooks/useChartData.ts: Fetches OHLC data for a given coin and timeframe, then detects candlestick patterns and calculates support/resistance levels using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCryptoPrices.ts: Fetches top 30 cryptocurrencies with staggered batch loading on initial load, implements retry logic with exponential backoff, and auto-refetches every 45 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTechnicalIndicator: Calculates technical indicators (RSI, MACD, SMA, EMA, Bollinger Bands) from OHLC data for a given coin and timeframe using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useTradingSignals.ts: Generates trading signals based on technical indicators for a given coin and timeframe, using React Query with dependency on indicator data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with cyberpunk dark theme using OKLCH colors, custom glow effects, animations, and utility classes for neon-styled UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Alerts.tsx: Displays trading alert history with filtering by crypto and signal type, showing statistics cards and requiring Internet Identity authentication to view alerts.
frontend/src/pages/CryptoDetail.tsx: Displays detailed cryptocurrency information including candlestick charts, technical indicators, trading signals, and AI-generated trade recommendations with entry/exit points. Supports multiple timeframes (1H, 4H, Daily) and fetches data using custom hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page showing market overview with a crypto table, market sentiment panel, and timeframe selector. Implements auto-refresh every 45 seconds and displays loading/error states with retry logic.
frontend/src/pages/Journal.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a trading journal feature.
frontend/src/pages/Portfolio.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a portfolio management feature.
frontend/src/services/coingecko.ts: CoinGecko API service with response caching (35s TTL) and request deduplication for fetching cryptocurrency market data and OHLC (candlestick) data. Includes TypeScript interfaces for market data structures.
frontend/src/utils/aiTradeRecommendation: Generates AI-powered trade recommendations by analyzing technical indicators, trading signals, candlestick patterns, and support/resistance levels. Calculates entry points, take-profit targets (conservative/moderate/aggressive), stop-loss levels, and confidence scores.
frontend/src/utils/candlestickPatterns.t: Detects candlestick patterns (Doji, Hammer, Shooting Star, Bullish/Bearish Engulfing) from OHLC data and provides trading action recommendations for each pattern.
frontend/src/utils/marketSentiment.ts: Calculates overall market sentiment (bullish/bearish/neutral) and a fear/greed index based on average 24h price changes, plus identifies top gainers and losers.
frontend/src/utils/supportResistance.ts: Identifies support and resistance levels from OHLC data by detecting local minima and maxima, merges similar levels within a 2% threshold, and ranks by strength.
frontend/src/utils/technicalIndicators.t: Defines TechnicalIndicators interface and implements calculation functions for RSI, MACD, SMA, EMA, and Bollinger Bands using price array inputs.
frontend/src/utils/tradingSignals.ts: Generates buy/sell/hold trading signals based on technical indicators (RSI oversold/overbought and MACD crossovers) with confidence levels.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with cyberpunk theme colors (neon cyan/purple/green/red), custom fonts (Rajdhani, JetBrains Mono), OKLCH color system, and custom animations including pulse-glow effects.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a crypto swing trading dashboard with cyberpunk UI, CoinGecko API integration, technical indicators, and known issues related to API rate limiting and data loading failures.
